thread.section_title: AnaJet Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of AnaJet | anajet.com
thread.title: Andrea Roberson

author: Andrea Roberson
title: Andrea Roberson
text:
I needed to add something to my order after I had already placed one. I called back within the hour and they added some items to my shipment which then made it free shipping because I had gone over the required amount for free shipping. The computer would not let them take off the shipping charge so they sent me a coupon for free shipping the next time I order! It was great!
Thanks!
